```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(scales)
library(ggthemes)


wc_top_scorers <- tribble(
  ~player, ~goals, ~country, ~code,
  
  "Klose", 1:16, "Germany", "DE",
  "Ronaldo", 1:15, "Brazil", "BR",
  "G. Mueller", 1:14, "Germany", "DE",
  "Fontaine", 1:13, "France", "FR", 
  "Pele", 1:12, "Brazil", "BR",
  "Kocsis", 1:11, "Hungary", "HU",
  "Klinsmann", 1:11, "Germany", "DE",
  "Rahn", 1:10, "Germany", "DE",
  "Cubillas", 1:10, "Peru", "PE",
  "Lineker", 1:10, "England", "GB",
  "Batistuta", 1:10, "Argentina", "AR",
  "T. Mueller", 1:10, "Germany", "DE"
  
)

glimpse(wc_top_scorers)


ggplot(wc_top_scorers, 
       aes(reorder(player, goals), goals)) +
  geom_col(alpha = 0.9, fill = "white") +
  geom_flag(y = -2, 
            aes(image = code)) +
  geom_point() +
  coord_flip() +
  expand_limits(y = -2) +
  geom_text() +
  theme_minimal()

```

```{r}
library(ggimage) # 2 letter ISO codes

f <- system.file("extdata/medals.txt", package="ggimage")
medals <- read.table(f, header=TRUE)
p <- ggplot(medals, aes(Country, count)) + geom_col(aes(fill = medal), width = .8)

p + geom_flag(y = -2, aes(image = code)) +
    coord_flip() + expand_limits(y = -2)  +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("Gold" = "gold", "Bronze" = "#cd7f32", "Silver" = "#C0C0C0"))

```
